title: The least frequent daily users of social media
summary: This chart shows the least frequent users of social media by Age Group .
\\n You can see that the least frequent users are in the 35 - 44 and 25 - 34 Age groups .
The most frequent users are in the 45 - 54 Age Group and they use social media twice as much the least frequent users .
gold: The graph shows a numbers of age groups and the amount of times in minutes how infrequently they use social media . The age group with the largest amount of time not using social media was the 45 - 54 age group at 150 minutes closely followed by the 15 - 24 age group at 125 minutes . The age groups with the least amount of time before going on social media were the 25 - 34 and 35 - 44 age groups at around the 75 minute mark .
